name: The Weather Painter Rain
text: If this card is Special Summoned: You can place 1 "Weather" Spell/Trap from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up. You can only use this effect of "Rainy Weather Lazula" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase of the next turn after this card on the field was banished to activate a "Weather" card's effect: You can Special Summon this banished card.
